content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you! I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite appealing, especially with its central location and modern amenities. So, let's discuss the price. What would you consider a fair offer for this property?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. Your apartment does indeed have an excellent location and I'm sure it will meet my needs. As for the price, I'm looking to pay around 750 Euro per month, all inclusive. Is that a price we could work with?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hmm, 750 Euro per month is quite a bit lower than what I was expecting. The location of this apartment, in the heart of Magdeburg, is prime real estate. I think a more competitive offer would be around 900 Euro per month, all inclusive. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 900 Euro per month is quite high for me, Herr Schmidt. While I appreciate the central location, I'm on a tight budget as a student. Could we perhaps meet in the middle at 825 Euro per month? This would be more manageable for me.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: As a landlord, I have to consider the market value and the costs associated with maintaining such a prime location. 825 Euro per month is still lower than what I believe the apartment is worth. However, since you seem to be a serious tenant, I'm willing to make a concession for you. Let's say 875 Euro per month, all inclusive. This is my final offer. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, your offer of 875 Euro per month is more acceptable. It's closer to my budget, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. With this price, I believe we can reach an agreement. Would you be willing to include a one-month rent free period as an additional concession? This would help me with the upfront costs.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but a one-month rent free period is not something I can offer. It would significantly reduce my income, which I need to cover the mortgage and maintenance expenses. However, I could consider waiving the security deposit if you sign a two-year lease and pay the rent on time. Would that be more beneficial for you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Waiving the security deposit and offering a two-year lease is a generous offer, Herr Schmidt. It would certainly help me with the upfront costs. With the reduced rent of 875 Euro per month and no security deposit, I believe we could reach an agreement. I'm ready to sign the lease if you are willing to proceed with these terms.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Excellent! It sounds like we have a deal, Max. I agree to the price of 875 Euro per month, and in exchange, I will waive the security deposit for you. Please take a moment to review the lease agreement, and once you're ready, we can sign the documents. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
